cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SI, cs.DS. 

The paper deals with a communication scenario over a noiseless channel, which is a typical topic in information theory (cs.IT). The paper also involves encoding and decoding of messages, which is a common topic in networked systems (cs.NI). The paper uses graph-theoretic approaches to solve the problem, which is a typical topic in distributed computing (cs.DC) and social networks (cs.SI). Finally, the paper deals with optimization problems, which is a common topic in algorithms and data structures (cs.DS).
